Class DnsLookup

Namespace
XPing365.Sdk.Availability.TestSteps
Assembly
XPing365.Sdk.Availability.dll

The DnsLookup class is a concrete implementation of the TestStepHandler class that is used to perform a DNS lookup. It uses the mechanisms provided by the operating system to perform DNS lookups.

public sealed class DnsLookup : TestStepHandler

Methods

HandleStepAsync(Uri, TestSettings, TestSession, CancellationToken)

This method performs the test step operation asynchronously.

public override Task<TestStep> HandleStepAsync(Uri url, TestSettings settings, TestSession session, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

url Uri

A Uri object that represents the URL of the page being validated.

settings TestSettings

A TestSettings object that contains the settings for the test.

session TestSession

A TestSession object that represents the test session.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

An optional CancellationToken object that can be used to cancel the this operation.

Task<TestStep>

TestStep object.
